explains: adj. 秘密的，秘密从事的；从事间谍活动的
wordGroup: undercover agent 卧底；警方密探

sentences.en: Officers had tailed the gang during a major undercover operation.
sentences.cn: 警方在一次重大的秘密行动中跟踪过这个团伙。

sentences.en: Journalists informed police who planted an undercover detective to trap Smith.
sentences.cn: 记者们向警方提供了信息，警方安插了一名卧底侦探诱捕史密斯。

sentences.en: Swanson persuaded Hubley to work undercover to capture the killer.
sentences.cn: 斯旺森说服了赫布利秘密工作以捕获凶手。
